localised_text.tooltip_text: Army View
Athel Tamarha||Improve your capability to protect Tor Yvresse by upgrading and using this secret citadel's facilities
Beastmen Panel
Gardens of Morr||Construct, destroy or fast travel to the Gardens of Morr.
Gardens of Morr||Construct, destroy or fast travel to Gardens of Morr.\n\n[[col:red]]Gardens of Morr will become accessible on turn 5.[[/col]]
Blessed Spawnings||Instantly recruit unique Lizardmen units to your army. Spawnings have stats improved over those of their standard counterparts.
Blessed Spawnings||[[col:red]]No units available. Missions that grant units as rewards will be issued over time.[[/col]]
Bloodlines||Awaken powerful [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords from Bloodlines to acquire powerful factionwide benefits.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in this location.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in the selected horde.
The Ivory Road||Dispatch caravans along the Ivory Road. Each route provides its own risks and rewards.
Changing of the Ways||Hatch plots and treasons to manipulate the destiny of all beings.
Wu Xing Compass||Control the direction of the Winds of Magic to bolster your defences or enrich the lands of Cathay.
Army View
Daemonic Glory||Unlock Daemonic Gifts and units by ascribing glory to the four Chaos Gods.
Recruit Camp||Use [[img:icon_ogr_meat]][[/img]]Meat to recruit a Camp as a base of operations, recruit units, improve your raiding and sacking potential, and gain various bonuses.
{{CcoStaticObject:SelectedCharacter.MilitaryForceContext.TooltipForSpawnForce("wh3_main_ogr_basic_camp", true)}}
[PH] Devotees
Imperial Gunnery School||Improve Gunnery units, and unlock experimental Amethyst weaponry.
[ph] recruit from flesh lab pool
Character Details||View this character's equipment, mount and skills.
Geomantic Web||View the state of the geomantic web - links between province capitals that provide provinces with powerful commandments.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (great_maw_panel = Component("59C57757-73AF-467C-A511DE8E115ABE91")) =>{ DoIfElse(great_maw_panel.IsVisible, Do(great_maw_panel.SetVisible(false), UiMsg("GreatMawPanelClosed")), Do(UiMsg("close_recruitment"), great_maw_panel.SetVisible(true), UiMsg("GreatMawPanelOpen")))}

localised_text.tooltip_text: Ice Court||Send candidates through training to become fully fledged Ice Witches and Frost Maidens.
Forbidden Workshop||Use Clan Skryre's Forbidden Workshop to upgrade war machines, weapons teams or produce a stockpile of Doomrockets.
Wu Xing Compass||Control the direction of the Winds of Magic to bolster your defences or enrich the lands of Cathay.

Labour Management panel||Use this panel to move [[img:icon_labour]][[/img]]Labour between owned provinces. You can also get a global view of your [[img:icon_efficiency]][[/img]]Efficiency within provinces.

Labour Management panel||Use this panel to move [[img:icon_labour]][[/img]]Labour between owned provinces. You can also get a global view of your [[img:icon_efficiency]][[/img]]Efficiency within provinces.\n\n[[col:red]]This panel is locked until you have two or more provinces[[/col]]
Winds of Magic Manipulation||Push and pull the strengths of the winds across the world.
Matters of State||Use stone and steel to perform powerful actions.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (meat_transfer_panel = Component("3F75B937-A42C-43EC-9A18F5A0161CBA8E"), transfer = PooledResourceTransferContext("wh3_main_ogr_meat")) =>{ DoIfElse(meat_transfer_panel.IsVisible, Do(meat_transfer_panel.SetVisible(false), UiMsg("MeatTransferPanelClosed")), Do(UiMsg("close_recruitment"), transfer.SetSource(SelectedCharacter.MilitaryForceContext), transfer.SetSelectedValue(0), meat_transfer_panel.SetVisible(true), UiMsg("MeatTransferPanelOpen")))}

localised_text.tooltip_text: Meat Transfer||Transfer [[img:icon_ogr_meat]][[/img]]Meat from armies to camps which can then be spent on building construction within the camp.
[[col:red]]There are no Camps to transfer Meat to[[/col]]
Hire Mercenaries
The Monstrous Arcanum||Track and hunt the world's most fearsome creatures to collect powerful items and place vicious monsters under your command.
[ph] recruit from flesh lab pool
Army Invocations||Use local [[img:icon_devotion]][[/img]]Devotion to empower your army by invoking the gods of Kislev.
Narrative Viewer
Fleet View
Notification settings
Summon Units
Offices||Assign your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords to offices, giving them various bonuses.
Bounties||Fulfil missions offered by other factions. Completion will improve relations between you.
Mercenary Contracts||Accept jobs to enter into other factions’ wars in return for payment and rewards.

button_open_war_coordination.componentleveltooltip: War coordination||Coordinate military efforts with your allies or vassals.

button_pending_negotiations.comment: This is for showing pending negotiations sent from other players in sim turns mpc. When clicked shows a popup with the pending negotiations which can then click on to access

localised_text.tooltip_text: Pending Negotiations
Raise Dead
Schemes||Plan tricks and pranks across the world.
Raise Dead from Battle Site
Shadowy Dealings||Send characters to carry out actions that advance Eshins agenda and Clan Contracts issued by the four Greater Clans.
Garrison Details||View the composition of this settlement's garrison, a local force that will defend the settlement in battle.
Overview||Manage the development of your buildings.
View in Objectives panel
Overview||Manage the development of your buildings.
View in the Schemes panel
Recruit Units||Recruit additional units that will defend this camp if attacked.
Slaves||Manage and view a detailed breakdown of the distribution of [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves across all of your provinces.
Sacrifices to Sotek||Perform Rituals to instantly gain Regiments of Renown, Army Abilities, Banners, Followers and other benefits.
Toggle Strategic Overview||Evaluate campaign progress from a global perspective
[PH] Teleport to battle
Witch's Hut||Create incantations to bless your units and curse the enemy before battle.

Witch's Hut||Create Incantations to bless your units and curse the enemy before battle.\n\n[[col:red]]You must have two or more Trinkets to access the Witch's Hut. Gain Trinkets through fighting battles or making alliances.[[/col]]
Next notification
Previous notification

DEV UI - gets the closest AI army to attack this selection on their next turn, if possible. If fails, will output to console reasons why could not. PROTIP: Use teleporting (select army, ctrl+leftclick) to move an army next to you to make this process quicker!

dev_button_end_turn_just_for_me.componentleveltooltip: DEV UI - ends turn just for player, skipping all others factions turn

end_turn_docker.comment: This propagates context constantly to avoid having to have update constant on all child components individually

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (transaction = InstantUpgradeCostContext.PooledResourceTransactionList.FirstContext) => { GetIfElse(FactionContext.CultureContext.Key == "wh3_dlc23_chd_chaos_dwarfs", Loc( "rush_construction_hint_province", transaction.Icon, transaction.AbsoluteValue, transaction.Name, SettlementContext.ProvinceContext.Name), Loc( "rush_construction_hint", transaction.Icon, transaction.AbsoluteValue, transaction.Name, SettlementContext.ProvinceContext.Name) ) }

localised_text.tooltip_text: These are the negotations sent by other players awaiting your review
These are the negotiations you have proposed that are awaiting review from other players

hud_campaign.comment: every time the event feed is updated it will be propagated to all components that need it (tab_events, end_turn_button)

icon_new_equipment.comment: In prologue show if any item unlocked, in non-prologue only show if armory pieces unlocked as ancillaries could be a bit spammy

icon_tech_required.componentleveltooltip: Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.

icon_teleport_available_daemon_prince.comment: Ian wanted to highlight teleport functionality first time it was available playing as daemon prince

label_num_rituals_available.componentleveltooltip: Number of skulls available for empowerment

PlayersFaction.ActiveMissionList.Filter((mission) => HasZoomLocation && (Component("03864E19-EAB8-49E8-8A2EC45D3D4CAE01").ShouldShowMission(mission) || ExIsPieceOfEight || ExIsScheme || ExIsLegendaryGrudge) && IsQuest == false && IsContextValid(TargetCharacterContext) == false && IsObjectiveOverSettlementWithGarrisonedArmy == false && IsContextValid(CharacterContextAtObjectiveDisplayPosition) == false)
CampaignRoot.IsCinematicModeEnabled == false && (InPendingBattle == false || IsLocalPlayersTurn == false) && IsScriptLockActive("hide_3d_ui") == false && IsPanelOpen("military_convoys") == false

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!

script_failure.componentleveltooltip: LUA has failed since last campaign load – many features are likely to be broken until the campaign is reloaded! These warnings can be disabled by deactivating the Enable Context Viewer setting in the Options menu.

tab_events.comment: Original Comment - We simulate a click on ourselves when getting events if not already seleted to auto open the list!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf(IsScriptLockActive("disable_events_dropdown_button") == false && self.IsSelected == false && EventFeedContext.EventGroupList.Filter(EventList.IsEmpty == false).IsEmpty == false, self.SimulateLClick)
